58286.「ああ よかった！ キッズは すっかり\n <pc>さんに なついたようですね！:
Oh, thank goodness! Fry seems to have taken to
<pc> pretty well! I knew you could do
it.

58287.「それでは さっそく キッズと共に\n ガケ崩れの現場に 向かっていただけますか:
So, why don't you get started and head out
with Fry to the site of the collapse?

58288.「ガケ崩れの現場は ドワチャッカ大陸の北東\n ダラズ採掘場に入って すぐの所で:
The site of the gouge collapse is just
northeast of Dwachakka Continent into the
Daraz Quarry.

58289.「キッズは あなたの後を追いかけて\n そこへ向かいますので 姿が見えなくても\:
Fry will follow you there, so don't worry if
you don't see him.

58290.「困りましたねえ ロッチェくん。\n さすがに ずっと こうしてるワケにも\n:
I'm at a loss, Mr. Roche. As expected, we
can't stay like this forever, so let's turn
back.

58292.「ひいいぃっ！ ま…魔物っ！\n あなた なんで 魔物なんか連れて……。:
Yiiiiiiii! Monster! Why did you bring that
monster...

58293.「チャーノさん！ こいつ アレじゃないです？\n 今 ウワサされてる あの極悪非:
Mr. Chano! Isn't this the guy? That
villainous, diabolical...

58294.「ご…後生だ！ カネなら出す！\n だから 命だけは お助けください！:
For God's sake! I'll pay you! Just save my
life, please!

58295.「……って え？\n ガケ崩れを解決するため ここに来たって？: What? You're here to solve the mess?

58296.「チャーノさん！ だまされちゃいけませんぜ！\n そうやって 油断させて オレた:
Mr. Chano! Don't be fooled! They're just
trying to catch us off guard so they can rip
us off.

58298.「あわわわ……。\n こっちに来ますよ チャーノさん！: Awww... they're coming this way, Mr. Chano!

58302.「いやはや おみそれいたしました！\n あんな大きな岩を いともカンタンに！:
I'm sorry to disappoint you, sir! How did you
manage to get that Large Rock out of the
ground?

58303.「追いはぎ扱いして すみませんでした。\n でも 魔物を そんなふうに連れ歩くな:
I'm sorry for treating you like a chaser. But
who the hell are you to carry around a monster
like that?

58304.「なるほど。まもの使い……ですか。\n 魔物を使って このような 人助けを……。:
I see. A Monster Master...? Using monsters to
help people like this...

58305.「そうとは知らずに 失礼しました。\n じつは 我々 あなたのことを\n 魔物商:
I'm sorry I didn't realize that. Actually, we
had mistakenly thought that you were a monster
merchant.

58306.「魔物商人とは 特殊な調教をした魔物を\n 兵器として売りさばく あくどい連中で:
Monster merchants are a bunch of scoundrels who sell specially trained monsters as weapons, and since you've been with a monster,
you've been...

58307.「いや しかし こんな素晴らしい職業を\n 世間の人が知らないのは もったいない:
It's a shame that people don't know about such a wonderful vocation. At the very least, I will spread the word to my merchant
companions.

58308.「それでは まもの使いの方。\n 我々は 先を急ぎますので これで。\n お助け:
Well, then, Monster Masters. We have to move
on, so I'll leave you to it. Thank you for
your help.

58309.「……クラハさん。\n あなたは 相変わらず お美しい。: Mr. Klaha. You are beautiful as ever.

58310.「あ…あの デイラーさん？\n 今日は どういった ご用件で……。: Uh, Mr. Dailer? How can I help you today?

58311.「これは 失礼。オレとしたことが\n あなたとの会話に 夢中になってしまった。:
Excuse me. I was just so engrossed in your
conversation.

58312.「今は メドウさん ご不在のようですね。\n そんな時に 申し訳ありませんが\n:
I understand that Coral Meadow is not available at this time. I'm sorry to bother you at a time like this, but I was wondering
if I could take a look around your pasture.

58313.「まあ！ 牧舎を見学？\n デイラーさん 魔物に興味が わきまして？:
Well! You want to see the barn? Mr. Dailer,
have you developed an interest in monsters?

58315.「なるほど。魔物たちに\n 興味を持っていただけるなら 大歓迎ですわ。\n どう:
I see. If you are interested in these
monsters, you are more than welcome. Please
take your time to look around.

58316.「ありがとうございます。では……: Thank you very much. Now then...

58317.「おい ヤサ男。牧舎で なに見ようってんだい？: Hey, Yasao. What are you doing at the ranch?

58318.「こ…これは メドウさん。お早い お帰りで。\n やっぱり 今日は おいとましよ:
This is Mr. Meadow. You're back early. I guess
I'll be going home for the day after all. Ha-
ha-ha-ha-ha...

58320.「あ <pc>さん お帰りなさい。\n ごめんなさいね。なんだか\n バタバタし:
Ah <pc> Welcome back. I'm sorry. I'm
sorry to show you that I was kind of
flabbergasted...

58321.「あの人は バトルマスターの デイラーさん。\n ファーベルの 剣の師匠を\n:
That man is Mr. Dailer, the battlemaster. He
is the one who bought Fabel's sword as her
master.

58322.「そう……。バトルマスターになる。\n それが ファーベルの夢なんです。:
Yes... to be a battlemaster. That's Fabel's
dream.

58323.「本当は…… 夫のような\n 立派な まもの使いに なってほしいのですが\n 私:
I really want her to become a great Monster
Master like my husband, but she won't listen
to me when I tell her.

58324.「でも 自分で決めたことですし\n 今は あの子の夢 応援してあげようって\n:
But it was my own decision, and now I can
honestly say that I will support her dreams.

58325.「デイラーさんも ファーベルのこと\n よく 面倒見てくれてますし\n あの子も:
Mr. Dailer takes good care of Fabel, and the
boy is very attached to Mr. Dailer.

58326.「ただ……あの人 時々\n 目つきが鋭すぎて ちょっと怖いんです……。\n って:
It's just... he sometimes looks at me so
sharply that I'm a little scared of him... I
shouldn't say such a thing.

68847.「ほう！ こいつは たまげたわい。\n キッズが イチゲンさんのエサを\n クチ:
Wow! I'm amazed at this. Fry's took a bite of
Ichigen's bait.

68848.「お前さん まもの使いとして\n いいモノ持っとるみたいじゃな。:
You seem to have something good as a Monster
Master.

68850.「ガケ崩れの解決に ドラゴンキッズ？\n ……と思うかもしれませんが\n 実際に:
Small Fry to resolve the collapse? You may be
thinking, "Why are they doing this?" but if
you actually go there, you'll understand why.

68851.「<pc>さんの魔物も もちろん\n お強いでしょうが このキッズなら\n 確実:
Of course, <pc>'s monsters are also
strong, but I'm sure Fry will get the job
done.

68852.「このコ…… ちょっと すごいんですよ。\n それじゃ お願いしますね。:
This girl... is kind of amazing. I'll take
care of it then.
